pages.text: $(li)The Lock Block can be bound with a $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/key)Key$(/l).$(br)$(li)To bind it, just right click a Lock Block while you are holding the Key in your hand.
$(li)Then, if you right click on the Lock Block while you are holding the correct Key in your inventory, this one will emit a redstone pulse of nearby utility.
